ud4.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā cālikāyaṁ viharati cālike pabbate.
ud4.1:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
ud4.1:1.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.1:1.5_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
ud4.1:2.2_0: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkami.
ud4.1:2.3_0: Addasā kho āyasmā meghiyo kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
ud4.1:2.7_0: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.1:3.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:4.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
ud4.1:4.2_0: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ.
ud4.1:4.3_0: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
ud4.1:4.7_0: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā’ti.
ud4.1:4.8_0: Sace maṁ, bhante, bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṁ meghiyaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:5.2_0: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
ud4.1:6.1_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.2_0: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
ud4.1:6.3_0: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:6.4_0: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:6.5_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ meghiyaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.6_0: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
ud4.1:7.1_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:7.2_0: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
ud4.1:7.3_0: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:7.4_0: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:8.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena taṁ ambavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.1:8.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ ambavanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
ud4.1:8.2_0: Atha kho āyasmato meghiyassa tasmiṁ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:9.3_0: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā.
ud4.1:9.4_0: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:10.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.1:10.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.1:10.3_0: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, tasmiṁ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:10.7_0: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā.
ud4.1:10.8_0: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:11.1_0: “Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṁvattanti.
ud4.1:12.1_0: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
ud4.1:12.2_0: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ paṭhamo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
ud4.1:13.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
ud4.1:13.2_0: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ dutiyo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
ud4.1:14.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:14.2_0: appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṁsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā;
ud4.1:14.3_0: evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
ud4.1:14.4_0: Aparipākāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ tatiyo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
ud4.1:15.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati, akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:15.2_0: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ catuttho dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
ud4.1:16.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
ud4.1:16.2_0: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ pañcamo dhammo paripākāya saṁvattati.
ud4.1:16.3_0: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ime pañca dhammā paripākāya saṁvattanti.
ud4.1:17.1_0: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṁ sīlavā bhavissati, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharissati, ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhissati sikkhāpadesu.
ud4.1:18.1_0: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṁ yāyaṁ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati, seyyathidaṁ—
ud4.1:18.2_0: appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṁsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā;
ud4.1:18.3_0: evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
ud4.1:19.1_0: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṁ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:20.1_0: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṁ paññavā bhavissati, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
ud4.1:21.1_0: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā—
ud4.1:21.2_0: asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya, mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāya, ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya, aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghātāya.
ud4.1:21.3_0: Aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṁ pāpuṇāti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānan”ti.
ud4.1:22.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
